sentence.Network_en: He told us that her age was forty-eight or thereabouts.
sentence.Network_cn: 他告诉我们她的年龄在48岁上下。

sentence.Network_en: He comes from Leeds or thereabouts.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是利兹或其附近的人。

sentence.Network_en: He's moved to Chicago or thereabouts.
sentence.Network_cn: 他已迁往芝加哥或其附近.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 近似字词-新浪字典 ... thereabout 在那附近;大约那时 thereabouts 在那附近;大约那时 thereafter 其后,从那时以后.
he stayed in London or thereabouts for several weeks ., 他在伦敦或者那附近呆几个星期.
somewhere in Kansas or thereabouts ., 堪萨斯的某处或其附近.
She must be 25 thereabouts ., 她肯定在 25 岁上下.

list.abs: The factory is in Leeds or somewhere thereabouts ., 那工厂在利兹 , 也许在利兹附近.
He wondered how the territory thereabouts was growing ., 他想看看那一带地区发展得怎么样了.
somewhere in Kansas or thereabouts ., 堪萨斯的某处或其附近.
he stayed in London or thereabouts for several weeks ., 他在伦敦或者那附近呆几个星期.

and while he believes Rafa Benitez's side must put together a winning streak to get back amongst the pace setters he not see any reason why be there or thereabouts come May .可是他认为拉法·贝尼特斯的红军一定能在与同分对手的比赛中连续赢得胜利，到了5月的时候，他找不到任何原因红军会不在争冠行列中。

entry.def: You add or thereabouts after a number or date to indicate that it is approximate.

example.ex: He told us that her age was forty-eight or thereabouts...
example.tran: 他告诉我们她的年龄在48岁上下。

example.ex: By 1997 or thereabouts Athens will have a new airport, plus the best underground railway in Europe.
example.tran: 到 1997 年前后，雅典将有一个新机场，还有欧洲最先进的地铁。

sentences.sentence: "he stayed in London or thereabouts for several weeks"

auth_sentence.content: He will be world number one or thereabouts.
auth_sentence.res_content: He will be world number one or thereabouts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He will be world number one or thereabouts.

auth_sentence.content: Mark Webber will also be there or thereabouts of course.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mark Webber will also be there or thereabouts of course.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mark Webber will also be there or thereabouts of course.

means.word_mean: (地点、时间、数量等)大约, 上下

sentences.en: I’ll see you at 9 a.m. or thereabouts.
sentences.cn: 我在九点或大约九点时见你。

sentences.en: He’s moved to Chicago or thereabouts.
sentences.cn: 他已迁往芝加哥或其附近。
